config.title: JSON-LD Schema for Justia Blogs:
config.description: We've added JSON-LD structured data schema to several of our Justia blogs, such as Onward, Verdict, and Opinion Summary Blogs, among others. This addition helps SEO crawlers better index our sites.

config.title: Onward and Avanza QA Automation:
config.description: Our QA Team released automated checks to ensure that our Onward and Avanza blogs are fully functional.

config.title: Customized Onward Feeds on <a href="https://www.justia.com/marketing/elevate/" target="_blank">Marketing<a>:
config.description: We have improved the relevance of the Onward articles shown within our Marketing site by targeting specific post categories.

config.title: Server Migrations:
config.description: Moving towards a more secure infrastructure, we migrated the server of some of our Justia friends' properties like NetForLawyers, Oregon Legal Research, ediscoverycouncil.com, and others over to VPC, highly reducing security risks.

config.title: Justia Amplify:
config.description: In order to improve the accuracy of billing calculations, we implemented a 2-month billing delay specifically for LSA services that was reflected in our internal reports, as well as in the monthly client reports.
